description: Engaging and motivating employees with training programs for call centres.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Request for Proposal: Training Facilitators Level 1 and Level 3**
============================================================

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01015168
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 100022491

**Notice Details**
---------------

*   **Publication Date:** 2022-11-29
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-04T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2022-12-14

**Contract Information**
---------------------

*   **Contracting Entity:** Employment and Social Development Canada
*   **Contract Address:** 142 Prom. du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 2K3 Canada
*   **End User Entities:** Employment and Social Development Canada (same as Contracting Entity)

**Procurement Information**
------------------------

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Trade Agreements:** World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Proposal Details**
-----------------

*   **Proposal Description:** Employment and Social Development Canada requires five (5) level 1 training facilitators and five (5) level 3 training facilitators for the delivery of virtual training courses, Enhancing Confidence in Communications – Serving Callers with Confidence to ESDC call centre employees.
*   **Estimated Quantity:** 140 training sessions
*   **Estimated Contract Duration:** 2023-03-01 to 2023-06-09

**Request for Documents**
-------------------------

Please visit [CanadaBUs.RSS-cheQual.head@RunWithCanada.acCanada](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) for the tender package and submission instructions.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

Please use the following contact details to reach out:

*   **Name:** Estelle Benoit
*   **Email:** [NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)

Submission Requirements
------------------------

*   **Proposal Submission:** Submit your proposal electronically through [CanadaBUs.RSS-cheQual.head RUNneth(" Canada.ca for the tender package and submission instructions.](https://canadabu
